content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to read the file "/usr/share/doc/README" using the command "read_file /usr/share/doc/README" but received an error message stating that the file does not exist. I then used the command "browse_website" with the URL "https://www.brno.cz/en/" and the question "What is the Brno Reservoir trail?" However, the website returned an error message stating that the requested page for the Brno Reservoir trail cannot be found on the website of the city of Brno, Czech Republic.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://hikingisgood.com/around-the-brno-reservoir/", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.south-moravia.com/en/sights/o70544-brno-reservoir", "https://www.tripsavvy.com/top-things-to-do-in-brno-czech-republic-5112855"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install tree"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
